original_title: Der Bestseller: Millionencoup auf Gran Canaria
overview: Crime novelist Leo Leitner tries to overcome his creative crisis on Gran Canaria. His lively roommate Bianca puts him on the trail of a real crime. The imprisoned millionaire fraudster Horst Rogner is said to have hidden his loot on the island. The money is being chased by prosecutor Anja Kr√ºger, inspector Eva Kollek and police chief Miguel Gonzales. For Leitner, all three are suspects.
title: Der Bestseller: Millionencoup auf Gran Canaria
